page.title: 09Outdoor Activities.
page.content: Canford Heath is a new residential area with much Urban Recreational Open Space.Many people,adults and children use this for relaxation like B.M.X-ing making hideouts and walking.Canford Heath Middle School go on cross country runs across it.Just outside this area there is a keep fit course as well.There are areas which have been cut down for children and adults to play golf and soccer.There are football pitches near our school where sometimes teams from the sunday league come and play on them.
